name: Dodgeball.io
description:
Be aware for the experience the battle royale game with the funniest characters. Dodge and pick up the ball. Throw the ball to the other players to eliminate them. Try to survive and be the last one standing. Addictive entertainment waiting for you!

Features:
- Free to play, play it anytime anywhere.
- Super realistic physics.
- Easy controls.
- Fast, addictive and fun gameplay.
publishers: Rollic Games Oyun Yazilim ve Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
